name: Keep the Change by Enscene
description:
Good at counting coins? Put your skills to the test in this challenging connect puzzle game.

Touch and drag to connect the coins to match the given change amount. Coins can be connected vertically, horizontally, and diagonally. The objective is to make as many matches as possible within the time limit. Bonus time can be earned by scoring points and making special coin combinations. Let's see how far you can get!
